fullwavepy.project.lists.basic¶

This module contains handles for collections of similar files e.g. models for different iterations. It allows, among others, to plot all items of the collection at once.

(c) 2019-2020 Kajetan Chrapkiewicz. Copywright: Ask for permission writing to k.chrapkiewicz17@imperial.ac.uk.

Classes

IterFileList(proj, **kwargs)

A handle for a collection of files dumped at certain iteration(s).

JobFileList(proj, path, FileClass, **kwargs)

A handle for a collection of files associated with every job run either locally or on a cluster.

ProjFileList(proj, **kwargs)

A handle for a collection of similar files.

ShotFileList(proj, **kwargs)

A handle for a collection of files dumped for certain shot(s).

TimestepFileList(proj, **kwargs)

A handle for a collection of files dumped at certain timestep(s).
